text: Gordon Richard England (born September 15, 1937) is an American businessman. He served as the U.S. Deputy Secretary of Defense and twice as U.S. Secretary of the Navy in the administration of U.S. President George W. Bush. ==References== ==Other websites== *Gordon R. England, White House biography * Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of the Navy Category:Businesspeople from Baltimore Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Gordon R. England
